thread.title: Jeff Goldblum and Emilie Livingston are parents, Goldblum at age 62 | The
thread.title_full: Jeff Goldblum and Emilie Livingston are parents, Goldblum at age 62 | The Advertiser

author: Network Writers
title: Jeff Goldblum and Emilie Livingston are parents, Goldblum at age 62 | The
text:
JURASSIC Park actor Jeff Goldblum has become a first-time father at 62 after his new wife, 32, gave birth on July 4.
Given Goldblum is currently shooting Independence Day: Resurgence at the moment alongside Australian Liam Hemsworth it was fitting that his wife Emilie Livingston delivered their little bundle on the US Independence Day holiday.
Third time’s a charm ... Jeff Goldblum, 62, says he believes Emilie Livingston, 32, is his soulmate. Picture: Supplied Source: Instagram
He took to Facebook to announce the birth of his son.
“We’re so excited to share the wonderful news of the birth of our son, Charlie Ocean Goldblum, born on the 4th of July. Independence Day,” he said.
Third wife ... Jeff Goldblum and his then pregnant wife Emilie Livingston. Picture: Getty Source: Getty Images
Second wife ... Geena Davis and Jeff Goldblum in 1998. Picture: Supplied Source: News Limited
Livingston, who married Goldblum in November 2014, is a Canadian contortionist.
She competed as a gymnast at the Sydney Olympics in 2000.
Emilie Livingston at Sydney Olympics
She met Goldblum in 2011 after training as an actress and appearing in a series of commercials and in Justin Bieber’s music video Beauty and the Beat .
Goldblum has been married twice before, first to actress Patricia Gaul and then to Geena Davis.
Emilie Livingston in Beauty and the Beat
Originally published as Goldblum a first-time dad at 62
